subject: College Athletics
College World Series
lead_paragraph: Ali Gardiner hit a game-ending grand slam with two outs in the bottom of the seventh as top-seeded Florida stunned Alabama, 6-5, in Oklahoma City to advance to the championship round of the Women’s College World Series for the first time. The Gators (63-3) will face third-seeded Washington in the best-of-three championship series beginning Monday night.
